transcript: I mean that exactly, any more selfish, it's just a little bit more selfish, and they'd have been here today. And it gave me an idea while I was watching them all go down.

segments.text: I mean that exactly, any more selfish, it's just a little bit more selfish, and they'd have been here today.
And it gave me an idea while I was watching them all go down.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean that exactly, anymore selfish -- just a little bit more selfish and they would have been here today. And it gave me an idea as I was watching them all go down.
